text: James Peter Hymers Mackay, Baron Mackay of Clashfern, (born 2 July 1927) is a British advocate. He served as Dean of the Faculty of Advocates, Lord Advocate, and Lord Chancellor (1987-1997). He is an active member of the House of Lords. Mackay was born in Edinburgh, United Kingdom. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Merk, "Lord Mackay of Clashfern", Bonner Rechtsjournal, Sonderausgabe 1/2012, S. 28 ff. title: James Mackay, Baron Mackay of Clashfern
